<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Bore Worm Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1083)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A single finger-length bore worm is unpleasant but mostly innocuous. Ten thousand bore worms, on the other hand, pose a formidable threat to even seasoned adventurers. The countless worms form a roiling, rancid mass of acid and pain, capable of delivering a hideous death to any person or beast unable to escape them. Unfortunately for any creature other than a bore worm, most encounters involve swarms.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/BoreWorm_BoreWormSwarm.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Bore Worm Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1083)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 36</row>

**Perception** +12; [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 60

**Immunities**
acid, precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 4, piercing 8, slashing 8

**Weaknesses**
area damage 4, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 4, water 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, burrow 30 feet

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 3d6 acid damage (DC 22 basic Reflex save). Creatures that fail this save become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) from the swarm's painful bites.

</column>
